A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
For reasons that can be found all over the internet\, this movie is an abomination. The "jokes"\, the character "development" of Luke\, the idiocy of the character Rose etc. The list just goes on and on.

If you've already watched this movie (and disliked it)\, don't watch the next.
And the fact that 91% of the so called "critics" recommend it while only 50% (at the time of writing) of the audiance recommends it says volumes about how much trust should be given to these critics.
